00018 #ifndef _SYSENDIAN_H
00019 #define _SYSENDIAN_H
00020 #ifdef _BIG_ENDIAN_
00021   #ifdef _DO_NOT_USE_BE
00022     #undef _BIG_ENDIAN_
00023   #endif //_DO_NOT_USE_BE
00024 #endif //_BIG_ENDIAN_

00026 /******************************************************************************
00027                              Definitions section
00028  ******************************************************************************/
00029 /* Swaping bytes */
00030 #define SWAP16(x) ((uint16_t)(\
00031   (((uint16_t)(x) & (uint16_t)0x00ffU) << 8) | \
00032   (((uint16_t)(x) & (uint16_t)0xff00U) >> 8)))
00033 
00034 #define SWAP32(x) ((uint32_t)(\
00035   (((uint32_t)(x) & (uint32_t)0x000000ffUL) << 24) | \
00036   (((uint32_t)(x) & (uint32_t)0x0000ff00UL) <<  8) | \
00037   (((uint32_t)(x) & (uint32_t)0x00ff0000UL) >>  8) | \
00038   (((uint32_t)(x) & (uint32_t)0xff000000UL) >> 24)))
00039 
00040 #define SWAP64(x) ((uint64_t)(\
00041   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0x00000000000000ffULL) << 56) | \
00042   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0x000000000000ff00ULL) << 40) | \
00043   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0x0000000000ff0000ULL) << 24) | \
00044   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0x00000000ff000000ULL) <<  8) | \
00045   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0x000000ff00000000ULL) >>  8) | \
00046   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0x0000ff0000000000ULL) >> 24) | \
00047   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0x00ff000000000000ULL) >> 40) | \
00048   (((uint64_t)(x) & (uint64_t)0xff00000000000000ULL) >> 56)))
00049 /* Macroses for reversing of bit fields in structure type depending on endian. */
00050 #if defined _BIG_ENDIAN_
00051   #define  BIT_FIELDS_1(f1) f1;
00052   #define  BIT_FIELDS_2(f1, f2) f2; f1;
00053   #define  BIT_FIELDS_3(f1, f2, f3)  f3; f2; f1;
00054   #define  BIT_FIELDS_4(f1, f2, f3, f4)  f4; f3; f2; f1;
00055   #define  BIT_FIELDS_5(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5)  f5; f4; f3; f2; f1;
00056   #define  BIT_FIELDS_6(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6)  f6; f5; f4; f3; f2; f1;
00057   #define  BIT_FIELDS_7(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7)  f7; f6; f5; f4; f3; f2; f1;
00058   #define  BIT_FIELDS_8(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7, f8)  \
00059       f8; f7; f6; f5; f4; f3; f2; f1;
00060 #else /* _LITTLE_ENDIAN_ by default */
00061   #define  BIT_FIELDS_1(f1) f1;
00062   #define  BIT_FIELDS_2(f1, f2) f1; f2;
00063   #define  BIT_FIELDS_3(f1, f2, f3)  f1; f2; f3;
00064   #define  BIT_FIELDS_4(f1, f2, f3, f4)  f1; f2; f3; f4;
00065   #define  BIT_FIELDS_5(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5)  f1; f2; f3; f4; f5;
00066   #define  BIT_FIELDS_6(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6)  f1; f2; f3; f4; f5; f6;
00067   #define  BIT_FIELDS_7(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7)  f1; f2; f3; f4; f5; f6; f7;
00068   #define  BIT_FIELDS_8(f1, f2, f3, f4, f5, f6, f7, f8) \
00069       f1; f2; f3; f4; f5; f6; f7; f8;
00070 #endif /* _BIG_ENDIAN_ */
00071 
00072 /* various macroses to swap bytes */
00073 #ifdef _BIG_ENDIAN_
00074 // Toggles the endianism of u16 (by swapping its bytes).
00075 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00076   #define swap16(x) ((uint16_t)__builtin_bswap_16((uint16_t)(x)))
00077 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00078   #define swap16(x) ((uint16_t)__swap_bytes_in_halfwords((uint16_t)(x)))
00079 #else
00080   #error unknown compiler
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 // Toggles the endianism of u32 (by swapping its bytes).
00084 #if (defined __GNUC__)
00085   #define swap32(x) ((uint32_t)__builtin_bswap_32((uint32_t)(x)))
00086 #elif (defined __ICCAVR32__)
00087   #define swap32(x) ((uint32_t)__swap_bytes((uint32_t)(x)))
00088 #else
00089   #error unknown compiler
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 // Toggles the endianism of u64 (by swapping its bytes).
00093 #define swap64(x) ((uint64_t)(((uint64_t)swap32((uint64_t)(x) >> 32)) | ((uint64_t)swap32((uint64_t)(x)) << 32)))
00094 
00095 #define CPU_TO_LE16(x) swap16(x)
00096 #define CPU_TO_LE32(x) swap32(x)
00097 #define CPU_TO_LE64(x) swap64(x)
00098 #define LE16_TO_CPU(x) swap16(x)
00099 #define LE32_TO_CPU(x) swap32(x)
00100 #define LE64_TO_CPU(x) swap64(x)
00101 
00102 /* Converting of constants from CPU endian to little endian. */
00103 #define CCPU_TO_LE16(x) SWAP16(x)
00104 
00105 #define CCPU_TO_LE32(x) SWAP32(x)
00106 
00107 #define CCPU_TO_LE64(x) SWAP64(x)
00108 
00109 /* Converting of constants from little endian to CPU endian. */
00110 #define CLE16_TO_CPU(x) CCPU_TO_LE16(x)
00111 #define CLE32_TO_CPU(x) CCPU_TO_LE32(x)
00112 #define CLE64_TO_CPU(x) CCPU_TO_LE64(x)
00113 
00114 #else //_BIG_ENDIAN_
00115 
00116 #define CPU_TO_LE16(x) (x)
00117 #define CPU_TO_LE32(x) (x)
00118 #define CPU_TO_LE64(x) (x)
00119 #define LE16_TO_CPU(x) (x)
00120 #define LE32_TO_CPU(x) (x)
00121 #define LE64_TO_CPU(x) (x)
00122 #define CLE16_TO_CPU(x) (x)
00123 #define CLE32_TO_CPU(x) (x)
00124 #define CLE64_TO_CPU(x) (x)
00125 
00126 /* Converting of constants from CPU endian to little endian. */
00127 #define CCPU_TO_LE16(x) (x)
00128 #define CCPU_TO_LE32(x) (x)
00129 #define CCPU_TO_LE64(x) (x)
00130 
00131 #endif
00132 
00133 /******************************************************************************
00134   \brief The macro for declaration of bit fields with little endian order.
00135 
00136     Total size of bit fields must equal 8 bit (or one octet).
00137 
00138   \param amount - amount of bit fields in octet.
00139   \param fields - list of bit fields that are separated by ','.
00140  ******************************************************************************/
00141 #define  LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(amount, fields) BIT_FIELDS_ ## amount fields
